abstract: New York State’s attorney general, Andrew Cuomo, issued subpoenas on Wednesday to seven executives who received tens of millions of dollars in 2008 pay from Merrill Lynch before it was taken over by Bank of America, Reuters reported, citing a person familiar with the investigation.
lead_paragraph: New York State’s attorney general, Andrew Cuomo, issued subpoenas on Wednesday to seven executives who received tens of millions of dollars in 2008 pay from Merrill Lynch before it was taken over by Bank of America, Reuters reported, citing a person familiar with the investigation.

headline.main: N.Y. A.G. Subpoenas 7 Merrill Execs, Report Says
